description:
Update terminology throughout the application to reinforce dossier-centric mental model. Changes include: 'GASTAT Dossier' → 'GASTAT International Dossier', use 'Dossier' instead of generic 'Entity' where appropriate, 'Create Engagement' → 'Create Engagement Dossier', 'View Details' → 'View Dossier'. Update all UI labels, tooltips, help text, and documentation to use consistent dossier terminology.

**Rationale (R9):** Inconsistent terminology confuses users about the system's core concept. Consistent branding reinforces that dossiers are the central organizing principle.
title: Dossier-Centric Branding and Terminology Update
